div.p:
Hello ${object.partner_name | safe}
Thank you for applying to the ${object.job_id.name | safe} at ${object.job_id.company_id.name | safe} .
We are delighted in your interest in pursuing a career opportunity with us and we will be reviewing your application carefully.
With the overwhelming volume of applications, please understand we are only able to notify candidates who are shortlisted.
Shortlisted candidates will hear from our Human Resource team either through call/email for the next step!.
Meanwhile, feel free to learn more about ${object.job_id.company_id.name | safe} here to know more about this company.
Job Description
Thank you once again for your patience and interest in joining our team!
Regards,
${object.job_id.company_id.name | safe}
${object.job_id.custom_work_location_id.name | safe}

record.field:
Dear ${object.partner_name | safe},


Thank you for applying to the ${object.job_id.name | safe} role at ${object.job_id.company_id.name | safe} . We would like to invite you to record a digital interview which will help us learn more about your experience and expertise.


We recommend you take the following steps to make sure everything runs smoothly:

- Close any other browser windows

- Close any application including instant messaging and calendar reminders

- Disable any pop-up blocker software

- Make sure you are somewhere quiet

- Make sure your internet access is stable



Digital Interview Tutorial Start Digital Interview

Thank you once again for your patience and interest in joining our team!

Best,

${object.job_id.company_id.name | safe}

Kepada ${object.partner_name | safe},


Terima kasih atas minat anda untuk melamar posisi ${object.job_id.name | safe} di perusahaan ${object.job_id.company_id.name | safe}. Kami mengundang anda untuk menghadiri wawancara digital supaya kami dapat mengenal anda lebih dalam lagi.


Kami menyarankan supaya anda mengikuti langkah-langkah di bawah ini untuk memastikan sesi wawancara digital dapat berjalan dengan sempurna:

- Tutup jendela browser selain jendela wawancara digital

- Tutup aplikasi selain browser seperti aplikasi streaming dan media sosial

- Pastikan aplikasi pemblokir pop-up tidak sedang aktif

- Pastikan anda berada di tempat yang hening

- Pastikan anda menggunakan koneksi internet yang stabil



Tutorial Wawancara Digital Mulai Wawancara Digital

Sekali lagi kami ucapkan terima kasih atas kesabaran dan minat anda untuk bergabung bersama kami!

Salam,

${object.job_id.company_id.name | safe}
